youtube.title: Why Does Your Eye Twitch? The Science of Eye Spasms Explained
youtube.description: Discover the biological reasons behind eyelid twitching. We dive into the science of muscle fasciculation, common triggers like stress and fatigue, and how your nervous system controls these involuntary movements. Perfect for biology students and curious minds!
